attr.title: Trolley Delayma
attr.desc: Trolley Delayma is a tiny puzzle game where you move around manipulating the tracks to save the victims and delay the inevitable fate forever. A combination of puzzle solving and fast reaction to save everyone, including you!
attr.inst: You can download Trolley Delayma free at: https://albertnez.itch.io/trolley-delayma . Download the Linux version version and extract it, and place the trolley_delayma.run.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the linux_v1_0_1.zip release.
